import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./faq.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Faq(){const[faq,setFaq]=useState([]);const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=useState(null);// Função para alternar a visibilidade das respostas
const toggleFAQ=index=>{setActiveIndex(activeIndex===index?null:index);};useEffect(()=>{fetchFaq();},[]);const fetchFaq=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/faq');setFaq(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Erro ao buscar Faq",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"faq-container",id:"faq",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"faq-title",children:"Perguntas Frequentes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"faq-list",children:faq.map((faq,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`faq-item ${activeIndex===index?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>toggleFAQ(index),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"faq-question",children:[faq.pergunta,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://bfbaby.com.br/up/seta.png",alt:"Seta",className:`faq-icon ${activeIndex===index?'rotate':''}`})]}),activeIndex===index&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"faq-answer",children:faq.resposta})]},index))})]});}export default Faq;
